titles: Pausanias, the betrayer of his country a tragedy, acted at the Theatre Royal by His Majesties servants / written by a person of quality.
author: Norton, Richard, 1666-1732.
Southerne, Thomas, 1660-1746.
publisher: Printed for Abel Roper, E. Wilkinson, and Roger Clavell ...,
notes: Written by R. Norton. Cf. BM.
